summary: Comprehensive testing of Harvest Scoring System (Enzy-parity). All backend APIs pass (17/17 tests). Frontend features working: tabs switch correctly, leaderboard shows real data with period filters, badges display with rarity/points, pin clicks open bottom panel, disposition changes award correct points, panel auto-dismisses after status change.
critical_code_review_comments: Scoring engine properly awards points: Not Home=1, Callback=5, Appointment=10, Signed=50
Leaderboard API supports all period filters (day/week/month/all_time)
Badges API returns all 10 badges with rarity and point values
Panel auto-dismiss after disposition change works correctly
Points toast shows earned points after status change
seed_data_creation: Created test pins during backend testing (cleaned up after tests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest Scoring System fully tested. Backend APIs: /api/harvest/scoring/leaderboard (with period filters), /api/harvest/scoring/stats/me, /api/harvest/scoring/badges all working. Frontend: Map/Ranks/Compete/Badges tabs work, pin clicks open panel, disposition changes award points and auto-dismiss panel.

backend_leaderboard_api.details: Returns leaderboard with period filters (day/week/month/all_time), user rank, score, streak, badges

backend_stats_api.details: Returns user stats: total_points, today_points, today_activity, streak, multiplier, badges_earned

backend_badges_api.details: Returns all 10 badges with id, name, icon, description, criteria, rarity, points_bonus, earned status

backend_disposition_points.details: PATCH updates disposition and returns points_earned: Not Home=1, Callback=5, Appointment=10, Signed=50

frontend_tabs_switch.details: All 4 tabs work: Map (satellite view with pins), Ranks (leaderboard), Compete (competitions), Badges (10 badges)

frontend_leaderboard_period_selector.details: Period selector buttons (Day/Week/Month/All Time) switch leaderboard data correctly

frontend_my_stats_card.details: Shows 'YOUR STATS' with today's points and day streak

frontend_badges_display.details: Shows all 10 badges with icons, names, descriptions, rarity badges, and point values

frontend_pin_click_opens_panel.details: Clicking on map pins opens bottom panel with address, status badge, 6 status buttons, contact form, action buttons

frontend_disposition_change_awards_point.details: Changing disposition via status buttons awards points and shows toast notification

frontend_panel_auto_dismiss.details: Panel auto-dismisses after disposition change (Enzy behavior)
